# DotNetBuildSettings.ProjectUsesSemVer property

A function that returns true if the named project uses semantic versioning.

```csharp
public Func<string, bool> ProjectUsesSemVer { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

If not specified, all projects are assumed to use semantic versioning. This property determines whether the `packagediff` tool is used to test each package.
